title: GET_PED_PROP_INDEX
content:
0x898CC20EA75BACD80x746DDAC0// GetPedPropIndex
int GET_PED_PROP_INDEX(Ped ped, int componentId);Parameters:ped: The ped handle.componentId: The component id to get the prop index from. Refer to SET_PED_COMPONENT_VARIATION.
codeBlocks:
// GetPedPropIndex
int GET_PED_PROP_INDEX(Ped ped, int componentId);

local ped = PlayerPedId()
-- Example usage for GET_PED_PROP_INDEX
GetPedPropIndex(ped, 0)
